name: Cotopaxi Paseo Travel T-Shirt - Women's
description:
No matter what the day has in store, this comfy tee is ready to go. Think of the Paseo as the ultimate travel tee, soft, quick-drying and it has an anti-odor finish, so you can push the gap between laundry days.Recycled polyester and 20% TENCEL™ is super soft, wicks away moisture and dries quickly.Polygiene® permanent odor control helps keep funk to a minimum.V-neck and side vents improve airflow.Slightly longer than your standard tee, hem is very tuckable.Cotopaxi designates 1% of their revenue to provide grants for non-profits.Cotopaxi products are guaranteed to last 61 years—the average lifespan of a person living in the developing world.

        Sustainability
